## Overview

This seminar is intended to help you develop and practice your presentation skills.

## Course Goals
At the end of this course students enrolled in BES 600 should...

* have developed and presented a talk / poster

## Student Learning Outcomes
At the end of this course students enrolled in BES 600 should be able to...

* understand some basic principles of data visualization and communication
* use these skills to present their research
